event.title: South West Ruby #16 - Social
event.description:
Join us at Cookpad HQ in Bristol, this month for South West Ruby social. Expect another Ruby packed evening with great conversations, beers and bites to eat.

Schedule

18:30 - 20:30 - Arrive, grab a drink, some delicious locally supplied food and have a chat with fellow attendees. This month weâ€™re having a social!

Slack

If you like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel

Notices

Please let us know in the comments of the event if you have any specific food allergies, dietary or access requirements so we can be sure to best accommodate everyone!
